verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your grace is enough, more than I need
At Your word I will believe, I wait for you
Draw near again, Let your Spirit make me new

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will fall at your feet; I will fall at your feet
And I will worship you here

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your presence in me, Jesus light the way
By the power of your word, I am restored
I am redeemed; By Your Spirit I am free

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Freely you gave it all for us, surrendered your life upon that cross
Great is the love, Poured out for all
This is our God, Lifted on high from death to life
Forever our God is glorified, Servant and King
Rescued the world, this is our God
